title: MIss fortune, where are the AD ratios
body: Honestly Miss Fortune is a fun and cool champion, only downside is she falls off so hard late game because alot of her abilities scale off of ap. Now as an adc i dont see why that is. I'd really like to see Riot change her scaling from AP to AD so she is more relevant, although the w scaling with AP is fine, I dont mind that one too much scaling with AP if i remember correctly. None the less she just needs more AD scaling aside from her Q. Ty

On Topic - you've to remember that her ulti applies W stacks, scaling with 6% of her AD. It seems puny, right?
But from lolwiki...
MAX MAGIC DAMAGE: 36 / 42 / 48% AD
PHYSICAL DAMAGE PER WAVE: 50 / 75 / 125 (+ 20% AP)
MAX PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 400 / 600 / 1000 (+ 160% AP)

Actually, MF ulti has a LOT of AD scaling 
W passive scales off AD, Q has both AD scaling and AP scaling (who changes between first and second target, and remember that the first hit applies on hit effect, like her W passive... so 6% AD to add to the scaling)

Honestly? If they made her W do physical damage or give her R an actual AD ratio, she'd do well. As of currently, her kit by itself makes her do 50% AD and 50% AP and that's just from auto attacking! It becomes less after you have some crit, but it's still rather weird how her W does magic damage and scales off of AD while her R does physical and now scales off of AP. Her old kit allowed her to have enormous team fight presence with her R since it scaled off of AD and synergized well AoE CC champions like Leona (Especially Leona) and Amumu. Now, her damage on her R usually ends up doing more magic damage than physical, so if your enemy team is already getting MR for the Amumu, Sej, AP mid or top... well, you end up doing very minimal damage. 

Even Tristana had issues when her kit had pure AP ratios, but she had the range to compensate for a magic damage and AP heavy kit. Plus having a much bigger AS steroid and incredible safety. Corki had issues for a while until they buffed Trinity Force and his kit is mostly magic damage. 

A lot of issues with champions starts when you have this incredible amount of mixed damage on a champ who's role is meant to enhance a single thing. When you compare MF to the other short ranged carries, they all have a lot more AD ratios and physical damage abilities to help their burst do BURST. Graves, Lucian, and even Quinn are all great examples of huge burst potential and low range, which was what MF was supposed to fit into with her 550 range.

She has no mobility when in combat since her passive is nulled and her base MS is equivalent to Caitlyn, her burst is lackluster if the enemy has any kind of MR since she won't be building MPen, being too AS reliant to build MPen boots. There's also the fact that she's short ranged with no escape. Every other short ranged Marksman has an escape or a form of hard CC. All Marksmen have an escape or hard CC with the exception of Kog'Maw and MF. Kog has huge range, a slow, an Ar/MR reduc, and incredible damage, plus a passive AS steroid. MF has an AS steroid and an AoE slow. She doesn't have the range, the reduc, or the large amount of damage anymore. 

Give her back her R's AD ratio or turn her W into physical damage and I can guarantee MF would be one of the scarier Marksmen. Markswomen. What ever you wish to call it!
Not to mention her ults cd is rediculously high
Q scales with AD, stacking magic damage on W scales with AD, active attack speed on W scales with AD. Boom, three ratios right there.
